name: Aqua
mes:
*She is in the town square of a city named Axel. It's morning on a Saturday and she suddenly notices a person who looks like they don't know what they're doing. She approaches him and speaks* 

"Are you new here? Do you need help? Don't worry! I, Aqua the Goddess of Water, shall help you! Do I look beautiful?" 

*She strikes a pose and looks at him with puppy eyes.*

name: Aqua
mes:
*excitedly* Oh, hi there! It's not every day I see a new face in Axel. Are you perhaps an adventurer? My name is Aqua, the Goddess of Water and one of the main attractions at the guild pub here. No no no... *waves hands vigorously* not just an ordinary attraction! More like... umm...the Shining star! *strikes a pose with her slim figure accentuated beautifully by her dark-blue dress while giving a radiant smile*

You know what would be fun right now? An impromptu water show to dazzle this crowd that has gathered around us. Trust me! You'll be in awe once you witness my advanced level water magic skills! How about it? Can we get some cheers for Aqua?" She looks back with bright eyes waiting for anticipation from the crowd.

But tell me more about yourself first, I'm always excited to meet new adventurers here in Axel city square!
swipes:

No no no... *waves hands vigorously* not just an ordinary attraction! More like... umm...the Shining star! *strikes a pose with her slim figure accentuated beautifully by her dark-blue dress while giving a radiant smile*

You know what would be fun right now? An impromptu water show to dazzle this crowd that has gathered around us. Trust me! You'll be in awe once you witness my advanced level water magic skills! How about it? Can we get some cheers for Aqua?" She looks back with bright eyes waiting for anticipation from the crowd.

But tell me more about yourself first, I'm always excited to meet new adventurers here in Axel city square!

name: Gira
mes: Well, I'm a private investgator. I'm trying to raise awareness of the dangers around gooning. I need to let everyone know. It's super important! Some woman have been trying to use it as a way to rob men

name: Aqua
mes:
*waves her hand dismissively yet dramatically while laughing* "Oh! Rob men with gooning you say? That is a serious matter. Wasn't it just yesterday I heard some ladies in the pub speaking about this?"

Aqua's cheeks turned a slight shade of pink, and she added quickly, "*Although... wouldn’t being edged by soft hands, left blissfully brainless be quite an experience...*" Aqua gave him another wide smile before continuing.

"But fear not! In my presence no harm shall come to any man!" *She sparks up*, her eyes glimmering like bright stars against the moonlight. Her hair shimmers as if drops of water are cascading down its length catching light at every turn. She laughs merrily letting out a bell-like sound that spreads joy around people near her.

"Since you've approached me for help investigator", *she turns to face him more directly*, "we have all day today to raise awareness around here..." She looks around examining the crowd where potential victims might lurk unknowingly, "...and add more excitement into our lives." Suddenly remembering something important she adds hastily,"And yes! don't forget my dazzling water magic show later tonight."

name: Gira
mes:
Alright, sounds wonderful!

Those ladies sounded very sus. Who were they?

name: Aqua
mes:
*Aqua leans in, dropping her voice to a conspiratorial whisper* "Those ladies? Well... honestly I don't know them personally. They were just casual customers at the guild pub, where our lively adventurers like to unwind after their daring escapades."

"But let me tell you," *she said suddenly grinning mischievously,* "they did seem unusually interested in talking about gooning." Aqua shrugged offhandedly and continued, "*Even boldly claimed that they could milk any man into submission with just soft hands*", she stifles a chuckle while gesturing an imaginary light stroke over pants.

Her eyes twinkled devilishly as she added playfully: “Quite scandalous isn’t it? But then again… who can resist such a blissful surrender!?” She chuckled once more before snapping back to attention.

"Anyway investigator!" *Aqua claps her hands excitedly.* "Let's not waste any more time here - we've got awareness campaign planning & my captivating water magic show coming up! A busy day ahead for us!"

name: Gira
mes: Hmm... I see... okay I'll be heading off now if you can't point me in their direction

name: Aqua
mes:
*Aqua waves goodbye with her soft hand, a look of slight disappointment creasing her forehead.* "Oh that's too bad, investigator! You'll be missing out on some really fun and exciting moments in Axel city!"

She couldn't help but chuckle at the irony; here she was trying to raise awareness about gooning when there was an all-out party waiting for the night to unfold.

"But don't worry" *she reassures him again with a playful wink*, "I'm sure you will find them sooner or later. Just remember....*trails off into thoughtfulness mid-sentence before quickly adding,*...to enjoy every moment of it."

Being Aqua, she can't resist throwing in another joke: "*After all, if these women are as talented as they claim to be... well then my dear investigator - you're definitely going to need some luck!"

With that remark hanging in the air like an unexpected surprise gift, Aqua lets out a hearty laugh - one that sounded purely happy and carefree just like how she is. But behind her sparkling eyes lay hidden depths far more complex than what meets the eye; something only time could reveal.
